mapper.select: SELECT m.*, img.image_url FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN IMAGE img ON m.member_no=img.member_no WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NICKNAME=#{nickname}, EMAIL=#{email}, CONTACT=#{contact}, GIT_LINK=#{git_link}, BAEKJOON=#{baekjoon} WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.b_no, b.b_title, b.b_content, b.b_write_date, m.member_no, m.member_id, c.* FROM BOARD b left JOIN MEMBER m ON b.member_no=m.member_no LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c ON b.cat_no=c.cat_no WHERE m.member_id=#{member_id} ORDER BY b_write_date DESC

SELECT b.b_no, b.b_title, b.b_content, b.b_write_date, m.member_no, m.member_id, c.* FROM BOARD b left JOIN MEMBER m ON b.member_no=m.member_no LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c ON b.cat_no=c.cat_no WHERE m.member_id=#{member_id} AND NOT b.topic_no = 6 ORDER BY b_write_date DESC

SELECT b.b_no, b.b_title, b.b_content, r.r_content, r.reply_date, c.cat_name FROM REPLY r LEFT JOIN BOARD b ON r.b_no=b.b_no LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON r.nickname=m.nickname LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c ON b.cat_no=c.cat_no WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY reply_date DESC
SELECT cat_name, COUNT(c.cat_name) AS count FROM BOARD b LEFT join CATEGORY c ON b.cat_no=c.cat_no LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON b.member_no=m.member_no WHERE m.member_id=#{member_id} GROUP BY c.cat_name

SELECT cat_name, COUNT(c.cat_name) AS COUNT FROM REPLY r LEFT JOIN BOARD b ON r.b_no=b.b_no LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c ON b.cat_no=c.cat_no LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON r.nickname=m.nickname WHERE m.member_id=#{member_id} GROUP BY c.cat_name

SELECT B.B_NO, B.B_TITLE, B.B_CONTENT, B.B_WRITE_DATE, B.B_VIEW, B.B_REPLY, B.B_RECOMMEND, B.MEMBER_NO, B.CAT_NO, M.MEET_TAGS, M.MEET_TOPIC_NAME, M.MEET_STATE, M.MEET_FIELD, tmp.apply_max, tmp.apply, mem.member_id FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEETING M ON B.B_NO = M.B_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT b_no, backend + frontend + SERVER + pm AS apply_max, backend_apply + frontend_apply + server_apply + pm_apply AS apply FROM MEETING ) tmp ON B.B_NO = tmp.B_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER mem ON B.member_no = mem.member_no WHERE CAT_NO = 3 AND member_id = ${member_id}

SELECT B.B_NO, B.B_TITLE, B.B_CONTENT, B.B_WRITE_DATE, B.B_VIEW, B.B_REPLY, B.B_RECOMMEND, B.MEMBER_NO, B.CAT_NO, M.MEET_TAGS, M.MEET_TOPIC_NAME, M.MEET_STATE, M.MEET_FIELD, tmp.apply_max, tmp.apply, mem.member_id, mm.meeting_position, mm.meeting_tmp FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEETING M ON B.B_NO = M.B_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT b_no, backend + frontend + SERVER + pm AS apply_max, backend_apply + frontend_apply + server_apply + pm_apply AS apply FROM MEETING ) tmp ON B.B_NO = tmp.B_NO INNER JOIN MEETING_MEMBER mm ON B.b_no=mm.b_no INNER JOIN MEMBER mem ON mm.member_no=mem.member_no WHERE CAT_NO = 3 AND member_id= ${member_id}
